projects.name: No Time To Explain indie game
projects.blurb: I am you from the future. There is No Time To Explain. Follow m-- AAAUAUUGHHH!!!! Be part of an indie game with a sense of humor.

projects.name: In Profundis - random cave exploration sim/game
projects.blurb: A randomized, 2D cave exploration game, using cellular automation to simulate a vast game world.

projects.name: slider: a new game for Android and other mobile devices
projects.blurb: a simple but highly addictive puzzle game for Android (and later for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch)!

projects.name: Turf Geography Club: An iPhone Game
projects.blurb: Turf is a free location based iOS game set in the real world where you hang out with friends, amass gold coins, & collect properties.

projects.name: Chester: The Hand-Drawn/8-Bit/LCD/Blueprint/etc. platformer!
projects.blurb: An almost completely handdrawn platformer. 10+ characters, 5+ worlds, and several "styles" that allow you to change the game at will.

projects.name: OVNI   < a community-powered retro indie game >
projects.blurb:
OVNI is a free, Flixel/Flash-built UFO-piloting indie game featuring community-generated content.
Hold onto your meat, Humans!

projects.name: A Cloudy Adventure
projects.blurb: A Cloudy Adventure is an iPhone game with a lighthearted story about good vs evil and triumph over adversity.

projects.name: Thunderbeam! for the iPad
projects.blurb: Thunderbeam is a retro-futuristic adventure game for the iPad, with an original score and sound design by The Octopus Project.

projects.name: City of Epic: An Exercise RPG
projects.blurb: We’re helping people stick to their workout routines by creating an online RPG based around real-world physical activity.

projects.name: Puzzling Tangrams For All Ages
projects.blurb: "Puzzling Tangrams" is a fun tangram puzzle iPhone application for all ages. Challenge your mental agility through solving tangrams!

projects.name: Bliss Stage Visual Novel
projects.blurb: Visual novel based on the tabletop RPG. Seven years after an alien attack you will strike back with the aliens' weapons.

projects.name: Aleph - Remember what made games great?
projects.blurb: Aleph is an RPG for the PC platform. It is greatly inspired by RPGs of yore, with dungeons full of monsters, traps, and treasure!

projects.name: RoboArena- Asynchronous Multiplayer Tactical iOS Game
projects.blurb: A single and multiplayer casual strategy game for the iPhone and iPad inspired by classics like X-Com and RoboSports!

projects.name: Catball Eats It All
projects.blurb: A new game for iPhone/iPad and Android. You are the Catball, a greedy little creature that wants nothing more than to eat it all!

projects.name: Tinkatolli! The unbelievably creative virtual world for kids
projects.blurb: The online world that inspires kids to leave the computer and do what they ought to be doing - moving, thinking, giving and creating!

projects.name: Air Guitar Move for iPhone
projects.blurb: Have you ever secretly played air guitar to a song? With the Air Guitar Move and an iPhone you finally can play air guitar for real.

projects.name: Safe Zone - Survive a Zombie-Infested Odyssey Across the USA
projects.blurb: Safe Zone - Travel across a zombie-infested USA to a safe zone on the West coast.

projects.name: Patch Notes: The Game
projects.blurb: Patch Notes: The Game is a satirical top-down multiplayer twin-stick shooter with a new patch coming out every ten seconds!

projects.name: Robots Love Ice Cream game for the iPad
projects.blurb: Play the role of an ice cream truck driver defending the galaxy from robotic invaders in this fun, fast-paced, beautiful iPad game.

projects.name: The Videogame History Museum
projects.blurb: The Videogame History Museum will house the world's most comprehensive videogame archive in the Silicon Valley area of California.
